title: BRING BACK BRAND
body: Riot pride themselves it seems in taking away the most fun elements of each of the game modes we ask for. Example; being able to choose your own champ in urf, taking away teemo in one for all, and now taking away brand from doom bots! this is retarded and vote this up if you agree and want to play the RGM because of broken things to try, not for a balanced game.

replies.body: You have no idea why brand was even disabled. Chances are it has nothing to do with your personal desire to cheese the game mode.

A better solution would be to give another bonus at 40 kills when playing at 100.
For example, this bloodbath of a game I just played : http://matchhistory.na.leagueoflegends.com/en/#match-details/NA1/2326218614/208103146?tab=overview
44 kills vs level 100 doombots
